entry.title: Mooninite
entry.content: Recently I have become quite interested in electronics. Beside my Rock Band hack I have been trying to figure out how to etch my own PCBs. I am sorry to say it has not been going very well. The process of transferring the design to the pcb has not been working. I tried regular photo paper like so may people recommend and then tried Pulsar transfer paper. The toner just floats away when I soak the paper off. I managed to get enough of the design to stick as a template and then I used the old fashion tape method. I had some traces that were not complete and solder wires across them. There is still some issue somewhere I have to track down as only a few LEDs are lighting. This project has just not been going well for some reason. The Mooninite plans came from here.
